attributes.action: Stop Kier Starmer delaying the local elections.
attributes.additional_details:
Kier Starmer and the Labour Party are running scared and they are denying the British people having their say by suppression. 
We all know what the Labour Party are doing and they have and are failing the British people daily. So the local elections must go ahead.
attributes.background: Kier Starmer must allow the local Elections to go ahead without delays or underhanded tactics.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
